ygData.subject: jewelry/tailor knowledge needed!
ygData.msgSnippet: I am just starting out in trying to master the skills of jewelry/tailoring. I have had a little luck with the tailoring (swatches,thread, bandages, hell even a
ygData.messageBody:
I am just starting out in trying to master the
skills of jewelry/tailoring. I have had a little luck
with the tailoring (swatches,thread, bandages, hell
even a wristband) but have had no such luck with the
jewelry skill. <br> I bought my silver bar then a
malachite & did my enchanted silver thing combined &
nothing~but this morning b4 heading in to work I tried again,
only using the plain bar (not enchanted) & combined
with another malachite & bam there was a ring! Not
worht a thing though cause it wasnt enchanted~will this
still help me to lvl in this skill?
